text: Ia Kraisɨn adarasi, ian arazir ia amiba kɨ bar dagh fo. Egha kɨ fo, ia pamtem ingarigha, egha tugha gavgafi. Egha gumazir kurabar aghua. Gumazir kaba ia mɨgɨa ghaze, “E uaghan aposelba.” Puvatɨ, me aposelba pu. Ezɨ ia men mɨgɨrɨgɨaba tuisigha gɨvagha, egha men nɨghnɨzir ifavarim gɨfogha ghaze, me pura gumazir ifavariba.
